juzs.text: Duo fu zai yongyou zhuquan zhe! Ta dui yu wanshi shi quanneng de
Ta ceng chuangzaole sisheng, yibian ta kaoyan nimen shei de zuowei shi zui youmei de. Ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi she de
Ta chuangzaole qi ceng tian, ni zai zhiren zhu de suo zaowu zhong, buneng kan chu yidian cenci. Ni zai kan kan! Ni jiujing neng kan chu shenme quexian ne
Ranhou ni zai kan liang ci, ni de yanjing jiang hunhua di, pijuan di zhuan huilai
Wo que yi yi zhong xing dianzhui zuijin de tian, bing shi zhong xing xiji emomen. Wo yi wei tamen yubei huo yu de xingfa
Bu xin zhu de renmen jiang shou huo yu de xingfa, na guisu zhen elie
Dang tamen bei touru huo yu de shihou, tamen jiang tingjian feiteng de huo yu fachu lu ming ban de shengyin
Huo yu jihu wei fennu er posui, mei you yiqun ren bei touru qizhong, guan huo yu de tianshimen jiu dui tamen shuo: “Nandao meiyou renhe jinggao zhe jianglin nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo: Buran! Jinggao zhe que yi jianglin womenle, dan women fouren tamen, women shuo:“An la meiyou jiang shi shenme, nimen zhi zai zhongda de mi wu zhong
Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo women neng tingcong, huo neng mingli, women bi buzhi lun yu huo yu de jumin zhi lie!”
Tamen chengren tamen de zuiguo. Rang huo yu de jumin yuanli an la de ci'en
Zai mimi zhong weiju zhu de renmen, jiang meng she youhe zhongda de baochou
Nimen keyi yinni nimen de yanyu; ye keyi ba ta shuo chulai. Ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de
Chuangzao zhe jishi xuanmiao erqie che zhi de, nandao ta bu zhidao nimen suo yinni de yanyu ma
Ta wei nimen er shi dadi pingwen, nimen yingdang zai dadi de ge fang xingzou, yingdang chi ta de jiyang, nimen fuhuo hou, zhi guiyu ta
Nandao nimen bupa zai tianshang de zhu shi dadi zai zhendang de shihou tunyan nimen ma
Nandao nimen bupa zai tianshang de zhu shi feishazoushi de baofeng cuihui nimen ma? Nimen jiang zhidao wo de jinggao shi zenyang de
Zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de renmen, que yi fouren zhong shizhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai tamen de shangmian zhanchi he lian yi de zhong niao ma? Zhiyou zhiren zhu weichi tamen, ta que shi mingcha wanwu de
Chule an la yuanzhu nimen wai, hai you shei neng zuo nimen de yuanjun ni? Nimen zhi xianyu zi qi zhi zhong
Shei neng gongji nimen ne? Ruguo zhiren zhu kouliu ta de jiyang. Buran, tamen guzhizhuo jiao'ao he beini
Jiujing shei geng neng huode yindao ne? Shi pufu er xing de ren ne? Haishi zai zheng lushang ting xiong er xing de ren ne
Ni shuo:“Ta shi chuangzao nimen, bing wei nimen chuangzao er, mu he xin de. Nimen que hen shao ganxie.”
Ni shuo: Ta shi shi nimen fanzhi yu da dishang de, nimen jianglai yao bei jihe dao ta nali
Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
Ni shuo: Guanyu ci shi de zhishi, zhi zai zhu nali, wo zhishi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe
Dang tamen kanjian zhe yingxu linjin de shihou, buxin de renmen de mianmu jiang bian cheng hei de! Huozhe jiang shuo:“Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian wangyan bu hui shixian de shi.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo an la huimie wo, he wo de tong jiao, huo lianmin women, name, shei shi bu xindao de renmen de mian yu tongku de xingfa ne
Ni shuo:“Ta shi zhiren zhu, women yi xinyang ta, women zhi tuo kao ta. Nimen jiang zhidao shei zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo nimen de shui yidan shen loule, shei neng gei nimen yitiao liushui ne?”
Nu nai, yi bi he tamen suo xie de mengshi
ni wei zhu de endian, ni jue bushi yige feng ren
ni bidei xiangshou buduan de baochou
Ni que shi jubei yi zhong weida di xingge de
Ni jiang kanjian, tamen ye jiang kanjian
nimen jiujing shei shi hai feng bing de
Ni de zhu dique zhidao shei shi panli ta de zhengdao de, ta dique zhidao shei shi zunxun ta de zhengdao de
Ni buyao shuncong fouren zhenli de renmen
tamen xiwang ni roushun, tamen ye roushun
Ni buyao shuncong mei ge wang shi de, beijian de
shuohuang de, jin chan de
linse de,guo fen de, fanzui de
cubi erqie shi sishengzi de ren
Na shi yinwei ta shi you caichan he zisi de
Dang bieren dui ta xuandu wo de jixiang de shihou, ta shuo: Zhe shi guren de gushi
Wo jiang zai ta de bizi shang dashang laoyin
Wo que yi kaoyan tamen, youru kaoyan yuanpu de zhurenmen yiyang. Dangshi, tamen ceng mengshi, tamen biding zai zaochen shouhuo yuanpu zhong de guoshi
bing bu liu yibufen gei pinmin
Dang tamen zhengzai shuijiao de shihou, cong ni de zhu fachu de zainan jianglin nage yuanpu
yidan zhi jian bian cheng jiaotu yiyang
Tamen ceng zai zaochen bici xiang hu
Nimen dang zai zaochen dao yuan li qu, ruguo nimen yao xiang shouhuo
Tamen zoule, tuzhong qiaoqiao de shangyi shuo
Jintian jue buyao rang yige pinmin zou jin yuanpu
Tamen zaochen qilai yiwei ziji shi neng ezhi de
Dang tamen kanjian yuanpu de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women dui shi mi wu de
buran, women shi bei boduo de!”
Tamen zhong zui youxiu de ren shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou dui nimen shuo ma? Nimen zenme bu zansong an la ni?”
Tamen shuo:“Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women que shi bu yi de.”
Yushi tamen zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun
Tamen shuo:“Shang zai women! Women yuanlai que shi fangdang zhe
Huoxu women de zhu, yi yige bi zhe hai hao de yuanpu, buchang women, women que shi kenqiu women de zhu de.”
Xingfa jiushi nayang de. Houshi de xingfa que shi geng zhongda de, jiaru tamen zhidao
Jingwei de renmen, zai tamen de zhu nali, bi jiang xiangshou enze de leyuan
Nandao wo shi guishun de renxiang fanzui de ren yiyang ma
Nimen you she me liyou? Nimen zenme zheyang panduan ne
Nandao youyi ben ke gong nimen song xi de tian jing
Zai na ben tian jing li nimen que you ziji suo xuanze de
Nandao wo ceng yu nimen dijieguo fuhuo ri cai man qi de, jianding de mengyue, yin'er nimen que you nimen suo panduan de
Ni wen tamen, tamen zhong you shei neng baozheng na jian shi ne
Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu ma? Jiao tamen ba naxie pei zhu zhaohuan lai, ruguo tamen shi chengshi de ren
Zai na ri, da nan jiang lintou, tamen jiang bei zhao qu koutou, er tamen buneng koutou
Tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Er guoqu tamen jianquan de shihou, ceng bei zhao qu koutou
Ni rang wo chengzhi fouren zhe xun ci de ren ba! Wo jiang shi tamen buzhi bu jue de jian qu yu huimie
Wo yourong tamen, wo de jice que shi zhoumi de
Ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, jiao tamen danfu tai zhong ne
Haishi tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu jiayi jilu ne
Gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, buyao xiang nage zangshen yu fu de ren yiyang. Dangshi, ta aozhe nu huyu ta de zhu
jiaruo cong ta de zhu fachu de endian meiyou dadao ta, name, ta bi shou zebei di bei pao dao huangliang di difang
Sihou, ta de zhu jianxuanle ta, bing shi ta ru yu shanren zhi lie
Buxindao de renmen jihu yi tamen de numu shi ni diedao. Dang tamen ting dao xuandu jiaohui de shihou, tamen shuo:“Ta que shi yige fengzi.”
Zhe “gulanjing” bushi bie de, ta shi dui quan shijie de jiaohui
Zhen zai
zhen zai shi shenme
Ni zenme neng renshi zhen zai shi shenme ne
Sai mo de ren he a de ren, ceng fouren da nan
Zhiyu sai mo de ren ne, yi wei yanxing suo huimie
zhiyu a de ren, yi wei nuhou de baofeng suo huimie
An la ceng shi baofeng duizhe tamen lian guale qiye ba zhou, ni kan a de ren dao zai dishang, haoxiang kongxin di hai zao shugan yiyang
Ni neng kanjian tamen hai you jieyi ma
Falao he zai ta zhiqian de ren, yiji bei qingfu de chengshi de jumin, you zai fanzui
tamen ceng weikang tamen de zhu de shizhe, gu ta yanli chengzhile tamen
Dang da shui fanlan de shihou, wo rang nimen cheng chuan
yibian wo yi na jian shi wei nimen de jiaoxun, yibian neng jiyi de erduo ba ta ji zhu
Dang haojiao yixiang
dadi he shanyue dou bei yidong, qie huxiang pengzhuang yici de shihou
zai na ri, na jian dashi jiang fasheng
tian jiang polie; zai na ri, tian jiang chengwei cuiruo de
Zhong tianshi jiang zai tian de ge fang; zai na ri, zai tamen shangmian, jiang you ba ge tianshi, danfu ni de zhu de baozuo
zai na ri, nimen jiang bei jianyue, nimen de renhe mimi, dou wufa yincang
Yong youshou jieshou ziji de gongguo bu de ren jiang shuo:“Nimen na wo de gongguo bu qu du du ba
Wo que yi caixiang dao wo bi yujian wo de zhangmu
Ta jiang zai yukuai de shenghuo zhong
zai chonggao de leyuan zhong
nalimian de shuiguo shenshou ke de
Nimen keyi yukuai di yinshi, yinwei nimen zai guoqu de suiyue zhongxingguo shan
Yi zuoshou jieguo ziji de gongguo bu de ren jiang shuo:“Aya! Dan yuan wo meiyou jieguo wo de gongguo bu
bu zhidao wo ziji de zhangmu
Dan yuan chenshi de siwang yi liaojie wo de yisheng
Wo de caichan yu wo hao wu biyi
wo de quanbing yi cong wo de shouzhong xiaoshi
Nimen zhuo zhu ta, gei ta dai shang jiasuo
ranhou ba ta tou zai liehuo li
ranhou ba ta chuan zai yitiao qishi bi zhang de lianzi shang.”
Ta shengqian que shi bu xinyang zunda de an la
bu mianli ren zhenji pinmin de ren
Gu jinri ta zai zheli meiyou yige qinqi
Chu nong zhi wai, ta meiyou shiwu
Zhiyou mi wu de renmen cai chi nong zhi
Buran! Wo yi nimen suo neng jian de wanxiang mengshi
bingqie yi nimen buneng jian de youxuan mengshi
zhe que shi yige zungui de shizhe de yanci
bing bushi shiren de yanci, nimen hen shao xinyang
ye bushi puren de yanci, nimen hen shao juewu
Zhe shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de
Jiaruo ta jiajie wo de mingyi, niezao yaoyan
wo bi yi quanli daibu ta
ranhou bi geduan ta de dadongmai
nimen zhong meiyou yige ren neng baowei ta
Zhe que shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaoxun
Wo dique zhidao nimen zhong you fouren de ren
Zhe duiyu bu xindao de renmen que shi huihen
Zhe que shi zhenshi de xinnian
gu ni dang songyang ni de zhu de daming
Youren ceng qingqiu yi zhong jiang fasheng de xingfa
Na shi wei bu xin de renmen er yuding de, meiyou renhe ren neng jiayi dikang
Na shi an la--tianti de zhuzai--fachu de
zhong tianshi he jingshen zai yi ri zhi nei sheng dao ta na li. Na yi ri de changdu shi wu wan nian
Ni anran di renshou ba
Tamen yiwei na xingfa shi hen yuan de
wo que yiwei na shi hen jin de
Zai na ri tian xiang rong tong
shan xiang cai rong
Qinqi xiang jian bu xiang wen
Zuiren yuanyi shu qu na ri de xingfa, jishi xisheng ta de ernu
ta de qizi, ta de dixiong
he na shourong ta de xuezu
yiji da dishang suoyou de ren, dan yuan na neng zhengjiu ziji
Jue buran, na que shi fa yan de liehuo
neng jie qu toupi
neng zhaohuan zhuanshen er taobi de ren
Ta ceng juji caichan jiayi baocang
ren que shi bei zaocheng fuzao de
zaoyu zaiyang de shihou shi fannao de
huode caifu de shihou shi linse de
Zhiyou libai de renmen, bushi nayang
tamen shi chang shou bai gong de
tamen de caichan zhong you yige ding fen
shi yong yu shi ji qigai he pinmin de
tamen shi chengren baoying zhi ri de
tamen shi weiju tamen de zhu de xingfa de
Tamen de zhu de xingfa, que shi nanbao bu jianglin de
Tamen shi baoshou zhencao de
chufei tamen dui ziji de qizi he nubi, tamen que shi bu yinci er shou zebei de
fan zai zhege fanwei zhi wai you suo yaoqiu de ren, dou shiguo fen de
Tamen shi zunzhong ziji suo shou de xintuo, he ziji suo di de mengyue de
tamen shi binggong zuozheng de
tamen shi jin shou bai gong de
Zhe deng ren, shi zai leyuan zhong shou youdai de
Bu xindao de renmen, zenme zhushizhe nimen, sanwu cheng qun de fen lie
zai ni de zuoyou ne
Nandao tamen mei geren dou xiwang ru enze de leyuan ma
Jue buran! Wo que yi yong tamen suo zhidao de wuzhi chuangzaole tamen
Buran, wo yi yiqie dongfang he xifang de zhu mengshi, wo que shi quanneng de
wo neng yi bi tamen geng hao de ren daiti tamen, wo bushi wuneng de
Ni yingdang ren tamen wang tan, ren tamen youxi, zhidao tamen kan dao tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi
Zai na ri, tamen jiang cong fen zhong chulai benzou, tamen haoxiang ben dao paiwei yiyang
tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Na shi tamen bei jinggao de rizi
Wo que yi pai qian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zongzu, wo shuo:“Zai tongku de xingfa jianglin ni de zongzu zhiqian, ni dang jinggao tamen.”
Ta shuo: Wo de zongzu a! Wo que shi nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe
nimen yingdang chongbai an la, yingdang jingwei ta, yingdang fucong wo
ta jiu she you nimen de zuiguo, bingqie rang nimen yanchi dao yige dingqi. An la de dingqi yidan lailin de shihou, shi jue bu yanchi de, jiaruo nimen zhidao
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi riye zhaohuan wo de zongzu
dan wo de zhaohuan shi tamen yujia taobi
Wo mei ci zhaohuan tamen lai shou ni de she you de shihou, tamen zong shi yi zhitou sai zhu tamen de erduo, yi yifu meng zhu tamen de tou, tamen guzhi er zi da
Ranhou wo dasheng zhaohuan tamen
ranhou wo gongkai di xundao tamen, mimi de quan jian tamen
wo shuo, nimen yingdang xiang nimen de zhu qiurao--ta que shi zhi she de
ta jiu shi fengzu de yushui jianglin nimen
bingqie yi caichan he zisi yuanzhu nimen, wei nimen chuangzao yuanpu he heliu
Nimen zenme bu xiwang an la de zunzhong ne
Ta que yijingguo ji ge jieduan chuangzaole nimen
Nandao nimen meiyou kan dao an la zenyang chuangzao qi ceng tian
bing yi yueliang wei guangming, yi taiyang wei mingdeng ma
An la shi nimen cong dadi shengzhang chulai
ranhou shi nimen zai fan yu dadi, ranhou, you ba nimen cong dadi qu chulai
An la wei nimen er pingzhan dadi
yibian nimen zai da dishang zouzhe kuankuo de daolu
Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Tamen que yi weikang wo, tamen shuncong na yin caichan he zisi er gengjia kui she de renmen
na deng ren ceng dingle yige zhongda de jimou
tamen shuo:“Nimen jue buyao fangqi nimen de zhong shenming, nimen jue buyao fangqi wang de, su wa er, ye wu si, ye ou ge, nai si er
Tamen que yi shi xuduo ren mi wu, qiu ni shi bu yi de renmen gengjia mi wu.”
Tamen yinwei ziji de zui'e er bei yan si, sui duo ru huo yu, gu tamen meiyou huode yuanzhu de renmen lai diyu an la
Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao liu yige bu xindao zhe zai da dishang
ruguo ni liu tamen, tamen jiang shi ni de zhong pu mi wu, tamen zhi shengyu bu daode de, bu gan'en de zinu
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni she you wo he wo de fumu, she you xindao er ru wo de fangwu de ren, yiji xinshimen hexin numen. Qiu ni shi bu yi de renmen gengjia huimie.”
Ni shuo:“Wo ceng feng dao qishi: You ji ge jingling yijing jing ting, bingqie shuo:‘Women que yi tingjian qiyi de “gulanjing”
ta neng dao ren yu zhengdao, gu women xinyang ta, women jue bu yi renhe wu pei women de zhu
Zansong women de zhu de zunyan! Chaojue wanwu, ta meiyou ze qu qi shi, ye meiyou ze qu ernu
Women zhong de yong yu, chang yi beimiu de shi wumie an la
women ceng caixiang ren he jingling jue bu wumie an la
Ceng you yixie nanren, qiu xie nan jingling baohu tamen, yin'er shi tamen gengjia jiao'ao
Naxie nanren ceng xiang nimen yiyang caixiang an la jue bu shi renhe si wu fuhuo
Women ceng shitan tian, faxian tianshang bu man jianqiang de weishi he canlan de xingsu
Guoqu, women wei qieting er changchang zuo zai tianshang ke zuo di difang. Xianzai shei qu qieting, shei jiu faxian yi ke canlan de xingsu zai dengzhe ta
Women bu zhidao, jiujing shi da dishang de wanwu jiang zao huannan ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yin tamen yu zhengdao ne
Women zhong you shanliang de, you ci yu shanliang de, women shi fen wei xuduo paibie de
Women xiangxin, women zai da dishang, jue buneng shi an la wunai, ye jue buneng taobi an la de qianze
Dang women tingjian zhengdao de shihou, women yi xinyang ta. Shei xinyang zhu, shei bupa kekou, ye bupa shouru
Women zhong you shunfu de, you guaizhang de. Fan shunfu de, dou shi youzhiyu zhengdao de
Zhi yu guaizhang de, jiang zuo huo yu de ranliao.”
Jiaru tamen zunxun zhengdao, wo bi shangci tamen de fengfu de yushui
yibian wo yi yushui kaoyan tamen. Shei tuibi zhu de jiaoxun, ta jiang shi shei ru zai yanjun de xingfa zhong
Yiqie qingzhensi, dou shi an la de, gu nimen yingdang qidao an la, buyao qidao renhe wu
Dang an la de puren qilai qidao de shihou, tamen jihu qunqi er gong zhi
Ni shuo:“Wo zhi qidao wo de zhu, wo bu yi renhe wu pei ta.”
Ni shuo:“Wo buneng wei nimen zhuchi huo fu.”
Ni shuo:“Renhe ren buneng baohu wo bu shou an la de chengfa; chu an la wai, wo jue buneng faxian renhe binan suo
Wo zhi neng chuanda cong an la jiang shi de tongzhi he shiming. Shei weikang an la he shizhe, shei bi shou huo yu de xingfa, erqie yong ju qizhong
Dai tamen kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa de shihou, tamen jiu zhidao shei shi geng gua zhu de.”
Ni shuo:“Wo bu zhidao nimen bei jinggao de xingfa shi linjin de ne? Haishi wo de zhujiang wei ta guiding yige qixian ne
Ta shi quanzhi youxuan de, ta bu rang renhe ren kuijian ta de youxuan
chufei tasuo xiyue de shizhe, yinwei ta paiqian weidui, zai shizhe de qianmian he houmian xingzou
yibian ta zhidao shizhe que yi chuandale tamen de zhu de shiming, bingqie zhouzhi tamen suoyou de yanxing, erqie tongji wanwu de shumu.”
Pi yi de ren a
Ni yingdang zai yejian libai, chukai bu duo de shijian
banye huo shao yidian
huo duo yidian. Ni yingdang fengsong “gulanjing”
wo biding yi zhuangyan de yanci shouyu ni
yejian de juexing que shi geng shidang de; yejian de fengsong que shi geng zhengque de
Ni zai baitian mangyu shiwu
gu ni yingdang jinian ni de zhu de zun ming, ni yingdang zhuanxinzhizhi de jing shi ta
Ta shi dongfang he xifang de zhu, chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, gu ni yingdang yi ta wei jianhu zhe
Ni yingdang renshou tamen suo shuo de lanyan, er wenhe de tuibi tamen
Ni rang wo chuzhi xiangshou anle er fouren zhenli de renmen ba! Ni shaoshao de kuandai tamen ba
Wo nali que you chenzhong de liao he qianglie de huo
you ye ren de shiwu, he tongku de xingfa
Zai na ri, tiandi he shanluan dou yao zhendong, er shanluan jiangyao bian cheng yi dui san sha
Wo que yi paiqian yige shizhe lai jiaohua nimen, erqie dui nimen zuozheng, youru wo ceng paiqian yige shizhe qu jiaohua falao yiyang
Dan falao weikangle nage shizhe, guwo yanli de chengzhile ta
Ruguo nimen bu xindao, name, nimen zenme fangbei na jiang shi ertong bai fa cangcang de rizi ni
Tian jiang wei na ri er polie, an la de yingxu yao shixian de
Zhe que shi jiaohui, shei yuanyi juewu, shei keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu

Ni de zhu dique zhidao ni libai de shijian, bu dao quan ye de san fen zhi er, huo er fen zhi yi, huo san fen zhi yi. Ni de tong jiao zhong, you yiqun ren yeshi nayang zuo de. An la yuding heiye he baizhou de changdu, ta zhidao nimen buneng jisuan ta, gu she you nimen. Nimen yingdang song “gulanjing” zhong jianyi de (wenci). Ta zhidao nimen zhong jiang you yixie bingren, he bie de xuduo ren, huo luxing sifang, xunqiu an la de enhui; huo wei an la er zuozhan, gu nimen yingdang fengsong qizhong jianyi de (wenci). Nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, bing yi shan zhai jie gei an la. Nimen wei ziji zuo shenme shanshi, dou jiang zai an la nali dedao geng hao geng da de baochou. Nimen yingdang xiang an la qiurao, an la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de
Gai bei de ren a
Ni yingdang qilai, ni yingdang jinggao
ni yingdang songyang ni de zhuzai
ni yingdang xidi ni de yifu
ni yingdang yuanli wuhui
ni buyao shi en er qiu hou bao
ni yingdang wei ni de zhu er jianren
Dang haojiao bei chui xiang de shihou
zai na shi, jiang you yige jiannan de rizi
Nage rizi dui bu xindao de renmen, shi bu rongyi duguo de

Wo shangci ta fengfu de caichan
he zai genqian de zisi
wo tigaole ta de shengwang
er ta hai qiwang wo zai duojia shangci

wo jiang shi ta zaoshou kunan
Ta dui yi sikao, que yi jihua

Wulun ta zenyang jihua, ta zhong shi bei qi jue de
Ta kan yi kan
ranhou zhoumei cu'e
ranhou gao'ao di zhuan guo shen qu
erqie shuo:“Zhe zhishi chuanxi de moshu
zhe zhishi fanren de yanci.”
Wo jiang shi ta duo ru huo yu
ni zen neng zhidao huo yu shi shenme
Ta bu rang renhe wu cunzai, buxu renhe wu liu xia
ta shaozhuo jifu
Guanli ta de, gongji shijiu ming

Wo zhi jiang guanli huo yu de zaocheng tianshi, wo zhi yi tamen de shumu, kaoyan buxindao de renmen, yibian ceng shou tian jing de renmen ren qing, er xindao de renmen gengjia duxin; yimian ceng shou tian jing de renmen he xindao de renmen huaiyi; yibian xinzhong you bing zhe he bu xindao zhe shuo: An la she zhege piyu zuo shenme? An la zheyang shi tasuo yiyu de ren wu ru mitu, shi tasuo yiyu de ren zunxun zhenglu. Zhiyou ni de zhu, neng zhidao ta de jundui, zhe zhishi renlei de jiaoxun
Zhen de, yi yueliang mengshi
yi shiqu de heiye mengshi
yi xian zhao di liming mengshi
huo yu que shi yige da nan
keyi jinggao renlei
jinggao nimen zhong yu qianjin zhe huo yu houtui zhe
geren jiang yin ziji de ying mou er zuo diya
wei xingfu de renmen chuwai
Tamen zai leyuan zhong huxiang xunwen
wen fanzui renmen de qingzhuang
nimen weisheme duo ru huo yu ne? ”
Tamen shuo:“Women meiyou libai
ye meiyou jipin
women yu wangyan de renmen yidao wangyan
women fouren baoying ri
yizhi dao siwang jianglinliao women.”
Shuo qing zhe de shuo qing, jiang wuyi yu tamen
Tamen zenme tuibi zhe jiaoxun ne

gang taobile yi zhi shizi yiyang
Buran, tamen zhong de mei ge ren dou xiwang huode yixie zhankai de tian jing
Jue buran, tamen bu weiju houshi
Zhen de, zhe “gulanjing” que shi yige jiaohui
Shei yuanyi, shei jiyi ta
tamen zhi yin an la de yiyu er jiyi ta. Ta shi ying shou jingwei de, ta shi yi yu she you de
Wo yi fuhuo ri mengshi
wo yi zi ze de linghun mengshi
nandao ren caixiang wo jue buneng jihe ta de haigu ma
Buran,(wo jiang jihe ta de haigu), erqie neng shi ta de mei ge shouzhi fuyuan
Buran, ren yu chang ci fangdang xiaqu
Ta wen fuhuo ri zai shenme shihou
Dang yanmu hunhua
yueliang hun'an
ri yue xianghe de shihou
zai na ri, ren jiang shuo:“Tao dao nali qu ne?”
Jue buran, jue wu renhe binan suo
Zai na ri, wei ni de zhu nali, you anding zhi suo
Zai na ri, ge ren jiang bei gaozhi ziji qian qianhou hou zuoguo de shiqing
Buran, ge ren dui ziji jiushi mingzheng
jishi ta duofang tuoci
Ni buyao yaodong ni de shetou, yibian ni cang cu de songdu ta
Jihe ta he songdu ta, que shi wo de zeren
Dang wo songdu ta de shihou, ni dang jing ting wo de songdu
Ranhou jieshi ta, yeshi wo de zeren
Zhen de, nimen xi'ai xianshi de shenghuo
er bugu houshi de shenghuo
Zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shi guanghua de
shi yangshizhe tamen de zhu de
Zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shi chouku de
tamen quexin ziji bi zao da nan
Zhen de, linghun dadao suogu
youren shuo: Shei shi zhu you de?”
Ta quexin na shi libie
(Si shi) jing yu jing xiang chan jie
Zai na ri, ta zhi bei qugan dao ni de zhu nali
Ta meiyou xindao, ye meiyou libai
Ta fouren zhenli, bei qi zhengdao
ranhou aoman de zou hui jia qu
Huimie jianjian de linjin ni
huimie yi jianjian de linjin ni.”
Nandao ren caixiang ziji shi bei fangren de ma
Nandao ta buceng shi bei shechu jingye ma
Ranhou, ta bian cheng xiekuai, er an la jiayi chuangzao ta, shi zhi chengwei zhiti wanquan de ren ma
Ta yong jingye zaohua liangxing, nan de he nu de
Nandao nayang de zaohua zhe buneng shi siren fuhuo ma
Ren queshi jingli yige shiqi, bushi yi jian keyi jinian de shiwu
Wo que yi yong hunhe de jingye chuangzao ren, bing jiayi shiyan, jiang ta chuangzao cheng congming de
Wo que yi zhiyin ta zhengdao, ta huo shi ganxie, huo shi gufu
Wo que yi wei bu xin zhe yubei xuduo tie lian, tie quan he huo yu
Shan renmen bidei yin hanyou zhangnao de liquan
ji an la de zhong pu suo yin de yidao quanshui, tamen jiang shi ta daliang yong chu
Tamen luxing shiyuan, bing weiju zainan pu jiang ri
Tamen wei xi'ai an la er zhenji pinmin, gu'er, fulu
“Women zhi wei qiu de an la de enci he xiyue, er zhenji nimen, women bu wang nimen de baochou he ganxie
Women dique weiju cong women de zhu fachu de yanku de yi ri
Gu an la jiang wei tamen fangyu na ri de zainan, bing shangci tamen guanghua he kuaile
Ta jiang yin tamen de jianren er yi leyuan he sichou baochou tamen
Tamen zai leyuan zhong, kao zai chuangshang, bu jue yanre, ye bu jue yanhan
Leyuan de yin ying fu bizhe tamen, leyuan de guoshi, tamen rongyi caizhai
Jiang youren zai tamen zhi jian chuandi yin pan he boli bei
jingying ru boli de yinbei, tamen yuding mei bei de rongliang
Tamen de yong naxie bei yin hanyou jiang zhi de liquan
ji leyuan zhong youming de qing kuai quan
Xuduo changsheng bulao de shaonian, lunliuzhe fushi tamen. Dang ni kanjian naxie shaonian de shihou, ni yiwei tamen shi xie sanman de zhenzhu
Dang ni guankan nali de shihou, ni hui kanjian enze he daguo
Tamen jiang chuanzhuo ling luo jinduan de lu pao, tamen jiang xiangshou yin zhuo de zhuangshi, tamen de zhu, jiang yi chunjie de yinliao shangci tamen
(Jiang dui tamen shuo)“zhe que shi nimen de baochou, nimen de laoji shi you baochou de.”
Wo que yi jiang “gulanjing” lingxing di jiang shi ni
gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue. Ni buyao shuncong tamen zhong renhe fanzui de ren, huo gu en de ren
Ni yingdang zhaoxi jinian ni de zhu de zun ming
yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bu fen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bu fen shijian zansong ta
Zhe deng ren dique shi aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri
wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen
Zhe que shi jiaohui, shei yuanyi juewu, shei keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu
Chu an la yiyu wai, nimen jue bu yiyu. An la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de ren, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa

dao yige dingqi

huo wu he si wu de ma

xiangshou tamen ai chi de shuiguo
